cons: Drumstick leaves have laxative properties, so, it may cause stomach upset, heartburn, and diarrhoea if consumed in significant amount.
The large quantity intake may also cause nausea so, avoid overconsumption and stay safe.
description: Moringa are the richest sources of vitamin A.Vitamin-A is one of the fat-soluble anti-oxidant offering several benefits, including mucosal repair, maintenance of skin integrity, vision, and immunity.

Fresh moringa (drumstick) pods and leaves are an excellent sources of vitamin-C. vitamin C helps the body develop immunity to combat infectious agents, and scavenge harmful oxygen-free radicals from the body.
name: Moringa Pods
pros: Moringa are the richest sources of vitamin A.Vitamin-A is one of the fat-soluble anti-oxidant offering several benefits, including mucosal repair, maintenance of skin integrity, vision, and immunity.

Fresh moringa (drumstick) pods and leaves are an excellent sources of vitamin-C. vitamin C helps the body develop immunity to combat infectious agents, and scavenge harmful oxygen-free radicals from the body.
Pregnant woman should avoid the consumption of bark and roots as they contain some chemical that may result in uterine contraction and consequently increase the risk of a miscarriage.
Antioxidants are compounds that neutralize free radicals in our body.
Benefits of moringa seeds for diabetes and blood sugar regulation.
Moringa is rich in Vitamin A, C, E and many B complex vitamins making it an excellent antioxidant.
It reduces the cell damage and ageing due to free radicals and help you maintain smooth and youthful appearance on your skin.
